<title level="1" right="Rules">[Key Terms](/Rules.aspx?ID=15)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 12 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
There are a number of important terms that you’ll need to know as you create your first character or adventure. Some of the most important terms mentioned on previous pages are also included here for reference.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
